title: Ep. - 398 - PAUL FRONCZAK FROM THE LOST SONS BRIAN MOYLAN REVIEWS VANDERPUMP RULES PREMIERE
description:
Paul Fronczak from the CNN Original documentary The Lost Sons. Imagine this: you’re 10 years old and find a box of old newspaper clippings in your attic. As you read, you realize the clippings are about you… and discover you were kidnapped the day after you were born. Thus begins The Lost Sons, and the story only gets crazier from there. Paul Joseph Fronczak was kidnapped from the hospital just a day after he was born, and for decades he and his family thought he was found 15 months later halfway across the country. But a DNA test and Paul’s search for answers only raise more questions.


Author Brian Moylan helps Kate review the season premiere of Bravo’s Vanderpump Rules.

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
